statements: SELECT * FROM LoanApplications;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 50000;
SELECT applicant_name FROM LoanApplications WHERE application_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT loan_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY loan_id DESC;
SELECT loan_id, applicant_name FROM LoanApplications WHERE application_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY loan_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE applicant_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY loan_id ASC, application_date DESC;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, application_date FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount < 1000 OR loan_amount > 10000 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC, application_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT loan_id, applicant_name, loan_amount, application_date FROM LoanApplications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT loan_id, applicant_name, loan_amount, application_date FROM LoanApplications WHERE applicant_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT record_id, loan_id, record_description, record_date FROM LoanRecords WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT loan_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY loan_id DESC;
SELECT loan_id, applicant_name, application_date FROM LoanApplications WHERE applicant_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY application_date ASC;
SELECT loan_id, applicant_name, loan_amount, application_date, record_description FROM LoanApplications INNER JOIN LoanRecords ON LoanApplications.loan_id = LoanRecords.loan_id;
SELECT loan_id, applicant_name, application_date FROM LoanApplications WHERE application_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT loan_id, applicant_name, loan_amount, application_date FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount <= 10000 AND application_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Loans;
SELECT loan_id, applicant_name FROM Loans WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT loan_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM Loans WHERE applicant_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT loan_id, applicant_name, application_date FROM Loans ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM LoanAssignments WHERE assigned_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Loans WHERE loan_amount > 10000 ORDER BY application_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM Loans INNER JOIN LoanAssignments ON Loans.loan_id = LoanAssignments.loan_id WHERE assigned_to = 'John Doe' ORDER BY Loans.application_date
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_loans, AVG(loan_amount) AS avg_loan_amount FROM Loans
SELECT Loans.*, LoanHistory.change_type FROM Loans LEFT JOIN LoanHistory ON Loans.loan_id = LoanHistory.loan_id WHERE LoanHistory.change_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT applicant_name FROM Loans WHERE application_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM Loans WHERE loan_id = 1;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE application_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT approval_id, approval_date FROM LoanApproval ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT loan_id, record_details FROM LoanRecords WHERE loan_id = 3;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM Loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT loan_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM Loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT loan_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM Loans WHERE applicant_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY loan_id;

SELECT Loans.loan_id, Loans.applicant_name, LoanApproval.approval_date FROM Loans JOIN LoanApproval ON Loans.loan_id = LoanApproval.loan_id WHERE Loans.loan_amount >= 10000 ORDER BY approval_date ASC;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, application_date FROM LoanApplications WHERE application_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY application_date DESC;

SELECT Loans.loan_id, Loans.applicant_name, LoanRecords.record_details FROM Loans LEFT JOIN LoanRecords ON Loans.loan_id = LoanRecords.loan_id WHERE LoanRecords.record_details IS NOT NULL ORDER BY record_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Loans;
SELECT loan_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM Loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT application_id, loan_id, customer_id, application_date, status FROM LoanApplications WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, loan_id, amount FROM LoanPayments ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT loan_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM Loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT application_id, customer_name, application_date, status FROM LoanApplications INNER JOIN Customers ON LoanApplications.customer_id = Customers.customer_id WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT loan_id, payment_date, amount FROM LoanPayments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT history_id, loan_id, action_date, action_description FROM LoanHistory WHERE action_description LIKE '%late%' ORDER BY action_date DESC;
